mapper.sql: id, user_id, booking_no, product_id, category_id, user_car_id, merchant, current_unit_price, other_charge, other_charge_info, total_price, create_time, status, update_time, booking_time, finish_time, remark
mapper.insert: insert into booking_item (id, user_id, booking_no, product_id, category_id, user_car_id, merchant, current_unit_price, other_charge, other_charge_info, total_price, create_time, status, update_time, booking_time, finish_time, remark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userCarId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{otherCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{otherChargeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bookingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update booking_item
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
booking_no = #{bookingNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_car_id = #{userCarId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
merchant = #{merchant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
current_unit_price = #{currentUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
other_charge = #{otherCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
other_charge_info = #{otherChargeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
booking_time = #{bookingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update booking_item set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, booking_no = #{bookingNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_car_id = #{userCarId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, merchant = #{merchant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_unit_price = #{currentUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, other_charge = #{otherCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, other_charge_info = #{otherChargeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, booking_time = #{bookingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into booking_item ( user_id, booking_no, product_id, category_id, current_unit_price, create_time, total_price ) values
( #{item.userId}, #{item.bookingNo}, #{item.productId}, #{item.categoryId}, #{item.currentUnitPrice}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.totalPrice} )
mapper.select: select a.name as category, sum(b.total_price) as sales, b.finish_time as date from booking_item b left join product_category a on a.id = b.category_id where b.finish_time >= #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and b.finish_time < #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and b.status = 3

select b.booking_no as bookingNo, a.name as category, c.username as username, c.email as email, c.phone as phoneNo, b.create_time as createTime, b.status as status, m.username as merchant from booking_item b left join product_category a on a.id = b.category_id left join customer c on c.id = b.user_id left join merchant m on m.id = b.merchant where b.create_time >= #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and b.create_time < #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and b.status = #{status}
